idea-plugin.name: Blazingly Fast Live Templates
idea-plugin.description:
Live Templates for blazingly fast development experience

Currently supported:

  • uses: React.useState()
  • usee: React.useEffect()
  • useh: React use Hook
  • rfc: React Functional Component
  • rfct: React typed Functional Component
  • rfr: React forward Ref
  • int: Typescript Interface
  • type: Typescript Type
  • arr: Anonymous arrow function
  • el: JSX element
  • rcctx: React create new Context with type, hook and provider
  • ifs: import fs
  • ipath: import path
  • funarr: Arrow function variable
  • fun: Function
  • asyncarr: Async anonymous arrow function
  • prom: New Promise
  • timeout: setTimeout
  • interval: setInterval
  • usem: React.useMemo()
  • usec: React.useCallback()

    • Checkout github.com/shakhzodkudratov/blazingly-fast for details on available snippets.
